author: Jael
text: Ok time to flood the pillow with tears 🙂

author: Jael
text:
My Twitter Crush is: @urboinessi

Find yours at https://t.co/8dFJLnQxQV

⠀ https://t.co/JKMrCAKZYz

author: Jael
text: Ah yes, this could get worst

author: Jael
text: Um, I've crossed the line this time

author: Jael
text: My dawn and dusk is in you

author: Jael
text: You are very important to me from the very first day I found you.

author: Jael
text: So, I can accept that I have no chance in you. And that's what I thought, until today which I knew the truth. I have many insecurities in making the first move confessing my feelings to you. Just to let you know, I hope you can wait for me to gather my courage to confess.

author: Jael
text: There were awkward moments that you saw my flaws right in front of you, times where I am at my vulnerable state. I admire your qualities that makes you look perfect. But, I also think that "How can a perfect person like you can be with me?". We are not even favoured by many.

author: Jael
text: It's already been 5 years when this feelings for you started and I've also been keeping it to myself for a very long time. I was astonished to know that you also have a crush on me. There are times thinking to myself of "what if's" hoping that you have the same feelings as I did.

author: Jael
text: Ah this can(not) be clear no?
